content.text:
# Maize rough dwarf virus

Maize rough dwarf virus (MRDV) is a plant pathogenic virus of the family Spinareoviridae.
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20070803225454/http://phene.cpmc.columbia.edu/ICTVdB//00.060.0.07.003.htm ICTVdB - The Universal Virus Database: Maize rough dwarf virus]
*[http://www.virology.net/Big_Virology/BVFamilyGroup.html Family Groups - The Baltimore Method]
